text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Uuu…! It's pitch black now…. Were the other girls staying over 
able to finish their work and leave…!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Then… I really am… all alone now….

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Nnnoo!! I'll keep going until it's finished!! Until I bring to 
life the ideal Demon Queen Windy-chan Castle, I'll never…!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (…because I was so happy.)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
(Digital and Doto joined, Palmer and Helios also 
came in… and then the Demon Queen army just kept 
on growing, everyone was so eager to help.)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (And then—)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: I was praised by our unyielding Demon Queen herself, after all.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
…Windy-chan is a Demon Queen. She leads others, and is looked up 
to as the coolest evil queen there is!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
That's why… she has to see this through to the 
end!! I'll make it! A Demon Castle that will 
push anyone's feet off, I'll make sure…!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure the Demon Army will be frozen in shock when they see it 
tomorrow. …Oh yeah, t-this will just be another great prank…!
(step step step…)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hyaaa!? W-What was that sound…!? No way… is it a ghost…!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Don't come any closer…! I need a weapon, a weapon!

text_block_list.name: Ghost?
text_block_list.text: Good evening～…

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Gyaaaaa!?!?!?!?
(THWACK!!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: OGYO!?!? Thank you very much!!!!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hyeee!? D-Digital-sa～an!!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I-I-I-It's just us, Windy-san! I'm so sorry for scaring you～…!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Doto!? Eh, then the one I just beat was… Digital!? Oh no… w-wake 
up～～! Open your eyes, Digital～～!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Indubitably, by your command～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Eh, you were awake the whole time!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
He he he, I am an undead jiangshi after all!! One of the Four 
Heavenly Lords of Demon Queen Windy-chan's Army!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …But most of all, I am one of your more faithful subordinates.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: So Windy-chan-sama!! Forgive me for my insolence, but will…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But will you allow us to assist you with placing the finishing 
touches to the Demon Castle!?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm sure we can be of use to you…! 
We humbly request this, Demon Queen!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: D-Digital… and Doto….

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
…I thought that flickering light looked familiar. 
Turns out it was Doto-chan's lantern.

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
But ain't we a crowd tonight. You think 
we can still apply to stay the night?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: E-Everyone…!? But why…!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
…Well-, couldn't sleep I guess? We're just so pumped to keep 
building the Demon Queen Castle!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
And we thought we could keep on working until the very last 
minute. …Windy-chan, will you let us help?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ～～～～hk, y-you guys….

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Hmph!! Honestly, what am I going to do with servants like these? 
…Be thankful your Demon Queen's heart is vast.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Now then, let's get back to work!!

text_block_list.name: Demon Queen Army Members
text_block_list.text: Ooooooo!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
……. 
…Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you think we can make the Demon Queen costume 
even more flashy? I mean, you're meant to come 
out all "WAAH"-like at the end of the path.

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Horns would look super cool too, right? I'm sure I can figure 
something out with some papier mâché!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
…! Yes, yes, it will definitely look super cool!! 
Let's do that!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (And just like that, the lively night went by in a flash–)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Mornin–! Got any work that needs helping!? Morning training just 
finished, so we're feeling gassed right now～～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
We're really sorry we couldn't come 
by and help lately!! Oh… whoa!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Mwahahahaha!! Ultra Evil Demon Queen 
Windy-chan!! Has now awakened!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
FIRE! BUSSIN!! NO CAP～～!! I'm dead!? 
Demon Queen, no cap love you～～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: This is awesome, Windy!! Just godly!! I've got goosebumps…!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hehe hehehehe…! It is, isn't it, isn't it～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Windy-san is really pleased with the result. I'm so glad…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
The Demon Queen is standing there while bathed in the morning 
sun!! It's too, too, too good that I keep coming back to life～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(…―Ah, it's already dawn. The morning of All 
Hooves' Day. I am with my friends, my friends 
are with me, the fun times are almost over.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (…So lonely.)
